page.title: 02SOCIAL LIFE IN BARTON
page.content: Barton-le-Clay has a population of some 3700 and offers a wide variety of social activities to suit all ages. For children there is a toddler group, and playgroup and the village has lower and middle schools, brownies, guides, cubs, scouts and a youth club. A ballet class is also held in the village. For adults there are various clubs including a very active Womens Institute and drama group. There are two Public Houses in this part of Barton; the Bull and the Waggon and Horses. A number of evening classes are offered for adults at the Arnold Middle School. There are also various church related activities for both adults and children.
